content.html: I will once again remind anyone who has written a line of code: You are literally a wizard. You have use a strange language to entice a rock filled with electricity to do your bidding. We speak to golems.
content.value:
I will once again remind anyone who has written a line of code:

You are literally a wizard. You have use a strange language to entice a rock filled with electricity to do your bidding. We speak to golems.
